subtitle: The interdimensional improvement pack
description:
This pack greatly improves the End and Nether dimensions

Features:

Nether:
- Nether Grass Patches
- Orange Mushrooms
- Nether Roots

End:
- Purple Ender Dragon
- Purple Endermen
- Purple Dragon Beam
- Purple End Portal Frames
- Purple End Portal
- Redesigned End Crystals
- Redesigned End Sky
- Multiple Skulker Variants
- 3D Chorus Plants
- 3D Chorus Flowers
optifine: OptiFine is used to add support for connected textures and random entity textures
